## Type of Changes

| --- | -------------------------- |
|     | :bug: Bug fix              |
|     | :sparkles: New feature     |
|     | :hammer: Refactoring       |
|     | :100: Add tests            |
|     | :link: Update dependencies |
|     | :scroll: Docs              |
